channel.title: CVE Feed for kkcal -- epg search result viewer(kkcald)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for kkcal -- epg search result viewer(kkcald)

item.title: CVE-2018-0510|2024-08-05T03:28:10.826Z -- kkcal -- epg%20search%20result%20viewer%28kkcald%29
item.description: Buffer overflow in epg search result viewer (kkcald) 0.7.19 and earlier allows remote attackers to perform unintended operations or execute DoS (denial of service) attacks via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2018-0509|2024-08-05T03:28:10.623Z -- kkcal -- epg%20search%20result%20viewer%28kkcald%29
item.description: Cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in epg search result viewer (kkcald) 0.7.21 and earlier allows an attacker to hijack the authentication of administrators via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2018-0508|2024-08-05T03:28:11.163Z -- kkcal -- epg%20search%20result%20viewer%28kkcald%29
item.description: Cross-site scripting vulnerability in epg search result viewer (kkcald) 0.7.21 and earlier allows an attacker to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via unspecified vectors.
